title: Ashampoo Snap 8 v8.0.6 RegEd [deepstatus]
description:
Ashampoo Snap 8 v8.0.6 RegEd [deepstatus]

Ashampoo Snap 8 surprises with nifty new features that you don't
want to go without once used! Discover numerous new possibilities
through innovative features and optimized work flows that bring
Ashampoo Snap 8 to a whole new level!


Full creative freedom

Ashampoo Snap 8 includes and improves upon all of your favorite
tools. Apply gradients to nearly all objects, add visual accents
with the new outline style, work with curved lines and arrows and
clone objects at the click of a button. Not sure which
application window you will need later on? Simply use "Capture
multiple objects" and record them all at once. Each window will
be added as a separate object and remain fully adjustable in
terms of size and position from within Snap.

RAM and disk space:
Ã‚Â· 256 MB RAM, approx. 50 MB Hard Disk Space for program files.



[INSTALLATION]


- Unrar with you favorite archiver, such as WinRar

- Install.

- Do not launch Ashampoo Snap 8 yet..

- Next import the registration.reg file into your registry,
which can be found in the Reg folder.

- Make sure you have administator mode if you have problems
importing the regfile.

- Ok, It's Activated!
